entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kugaaruk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:27 AM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -34.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kugaaruk Airport 08:00 AM MST Sunday 15 January 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -34.8°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 66 %

entry.title: Sunday: Clear. Temperature falling to minus 40 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 40 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 51 this morning and minus 56 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 43.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 43. Wind chill near minus 58. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Sunday 15 January 2023
